feed.title: Hazelcast IMDG Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Hazelcast IMDG news and events.

entry.title: Announcing New Documentation Website
entry.summary:
We are excited to tell you that we've just launched a new website for Hazelcast IMDG, where we share technical content regarding the project including how-to-guides and technical design documents.

We'll keep this website frequently updated. Stay tune...
